item.description:
Come join us on Wednesday, September 28, 2005 at 7:00 PM at Jacob Wirth for some good food and some light hearted Stammtisch talk. A lot happened since last month, including but not limited to Octoberfest, Elections and if Germany would be better prepared to deal with Kathrina and Rita.

See you on Wednesday!

Please do not forget to RSVP

Kaj
Your humble organizer
item.name: German Expatriates in Boston Meetup September Meetup
